name: C-Art
description:
C-Art combines gamification with art education to cultivate interest of contemporary art. It teaches art by experiencing it. The art featured in the game are split into art movements and consist of works created in the past century.This game was created as a Master's Thesis project for NYU Polytechnic School of Engineering's Integrated Digital Media program.

The works of art featured in C-Art are digital representations of the originals.
